text: Mafalda Veiga (born December 24, 1965) is a Portuguese singer-songwriter, born in Lisbon. ==Discography== * Pássaros do sul (1987) * Planície (single, 1987) * Cantar (1988) * Nada se repete (1992) * A cor da fogueira (1996) * Tatuagem (1999) * Cada lugar teu (single, 1999) * Um pouco mais (1999), wrote to Susana Félix * Mafalda Veiga ao Vivo (live, 2000) * Na alma e na pele (2003) * Lado a Lado (2006), duet with João Pedro Pais * Chão (2008) * Zoom (2011) * Grandes êxitos (2013) * "essencial" (2014) * Praia (2016) ==Bibliography== * Songbook de Mafalda Veiga (Quasi Edições, 2004) ==External links== * Official site * Lyrics from Mafalda Veiga Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese female singer-songwriters Category:Portuguese songwriters Category:Singers from Lisbon Category:Portuguese singer-songwriters
title: Mafalda Veiga
